title: Design Principles for tracetheme
text: package aim accessible users, including visual impairments. : default font size weight, default line thickness, reasonably high values default colour scale accessible colourblind users, non-colour printing.

title: Design Principles for tracetheme
text: hard dependency package ggplot2. anticipate using dependencies development package, colorspace package. development packages don’t need added DESCRIPTION file.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Wherever possible, use default colour palette provided package ggplot.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: default sizes visualisations slideshows vignettes. included tracetheme package:

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Capitalise first word axes labels. Use standard abbreviations (e.g. km) ensure defined caption training materials & vignettes.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: time represented plot, preferentially selected x-axis. text labels present axis, y-axis, unless labels express time measurement. words, prefer option left keep text legible figure sizes, without rotate labels.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Use ‘tag’ option ggplot figures subfigures, capitalise letters rounded bracket: ), B), C)

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Overall recommendation follow “less ” approach avoid “chart junk”. Recommendation focus specific set number needed, ask feedback team members, overall: Seven groups really many five groups seven five Five fewer Two three lines . annotations maximum 3 based : max 3

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: generally prefer using shaded regions dashed lines plots needing default option. However, can issue projectors secondary default option dashed lines.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Bayesian credible intervals 95% intervals default, demarcation can made 50% 75% intervals. applies prediction projection windows. single interval shown 95%. caption ggplot item define type interval. Central estimates mean default, median provided must caption.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Frequentist confidence intervals 95% intervals default. Method calculating interval given caption (e.g. binomial confidence interval, bootstrap interval). applies prediction projection windows. single interval shown 95%. caption ggplot item define type interval. Central estimates mean.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Use brackets denote intervals, hyphen separator space, .e. (0-5], (5-10]. Square bracket indicates limit included interval, round bracket indicates limit part interval. default behaviour upper limit part lower group. specified caption.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Using alt-text visualisations required graphs training materials vignettes. part automated checks GitHub tracked packagetemplate.

title: Guidelines for Visualisations
text: Working external partners may require flexibility using branding/styles.
